Clockwork_Army.display_help: You teleport up to three Clockwork to your location to provide support in battle situations.

Repair.display_help: You adjust the plasma stream of your beam rifle to release a nanite infused beam that will restore the health of a single damaged pet.

Single_Shot.display_help: You fire a single blast from your beam rifle, causing energy damage and lowering your target's regeneration rate. There is also a chance that you will knock your target down.
Single_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Energy), -Regen (Foe) Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Charged_Shot.display_help: You charge up your beam rifle and fire a concentrated blast of energy at a single target. This causes energy damage and lowers your target's recovery. There is also a chance that your target may be knocked down.

Cutting_Beam.display_help: You fire a constant stream of energy from your weapon, sweeping it in a broad arc to blast all foes in a wide cone in front of you. This causes energy damage and lowers the defense of affected targets. There is a chance that your target will continue to suffer energy damage briefly after the initial burst of energy damage.
Cutting_Beam.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Energy), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Moderate DoT (Energy)
Cutting_Beam.display_target_help: Your defenses have been reduced. There is a chance you may also be suffering energy damage over time.

Piercing_Beam.display_help: You fire a supercharged beam of energy in a narrow cone that pierces up to 3 enemies. Each affected enemy suffers energy damage and reduced resistance to all forms of damage. There is also a chance that there is an additional burst of energy that causes extra energy damage on a target.
Piercing_Beam.display_short_help: Ranged (Narrow Cone), Superior DMG (Energy), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Moderate DMG (Energy)
Piercing_Beam.display_target_help: Your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced.

Overcharged_Beam.display_help: You overcharge your beam rifle, releasing the accumulated power in a massive blast of energy targeted at your foes. This blast erupts on hitting the target, causing energy damage and significantly lowering the defenses of all foes caught in the burst. There is also a lingering damage over time effect, but this is much less powerful than the initial burst. Additionally, there is a strong chance that affected targets will be stunned.
Overcharged_Beam.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy), Minor DoT (Energy), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Stun (Foe)
Overcharged_Beam.display_target_help: Your defenses have been reduced. There is a chance you may also be stunned.

Antimatter_Particles.display_help: All foes suffer energy damage and reduced defenses for as long as they remain in your field of effect.
Antimatter_Particles.display_target_help: You are suffering energy damage over time and reduced defenses.

Psionic_Lash.display_help: You channel energy into your whip and lash out at your foe, dealing high energy damage and causing fire damage over time. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks. It will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target.
Psionic_Lash.display_short_help: Ranged (Close), Moderate DMG (Psionic), Minor DoT (Fire), -Rech (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Psionic_Lash.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. Your attack speed has also been reduced.

Psionic_Thrash.display_help: You create a whip of pure psionic energy and make an impressive sweep, causing psionic damage to enemies within a wide cone. Affected targets are seared by this attack and suffer additional fire damage over time. They also are unable to fly and suffer both reduced movement and attack speed. There is also a chance that affected targets will be knocked back.
Psionic_Thrash.display_short_help: Ranged (Short Cone), High DMG(Psionic), High DoT (Fire), -Speed (Foe, All), Chance for Knockback
Psionic_Thrash.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. You are also unable to fly and both your movement and attack speeds are reduced.

Psionic_Shot.display_help: You fire a psionic burst at the target, causing damage and increasing recharge time.
Psionic_Shot.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

Psionic_Slow.display_help: You ensnare your target in a field of collapsing psionic energy. They are immobilized and suffer continuous damage and endurance loss.
Psionic_Slow.display_target_help: You are immobilized. Additionally, you are suffering psionic damage and endurance loss over time.

Psionic_Pulse.display_help: You unleash a powerful pulse of psionic energy that strikes all targets around you. This pulse is of variable strength, but always deals a significant amount of psionic damage and reduces the attack speed of affected targets. There is also a high chance that affected targets will be stunned.
Psionic_Pulse.display_short_help: PBAoE, High to Superior DMG (Psionic), -Rech (Foe), Chance for Stun (Foe)
Psionic_Pulse.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced. You may also be stunned.

Psionic_Vortex.display_help: You unleash a whirling vortex of psionic energy at your target, causing the target and those near them to be afflicted with psionic damage over time. Additionally, all affected targets are knocked into the air and suffer reduced attack speed.
Psionic_Vortex.display_target_help: You are suffering psionic damage over time and reduced attack speed.

Psionic_Break.display_help: You channel psionic energy into the body of your target, creating a false injury within their mind. The target takes psionic damage and experiences reduced regeneration. Their mind makes the pain of the injury real, causing the target to also suffer lethal damage over time.
Psionic_Break.display_target_help: You are suffering lethal damage over time and reduced regeneration.

Psionic_Lightning.display_help: You cause a bolt of psionic energy to strike your foe, dealing heavy damage. These bolts also have a chance to drain the enemy's endurance.

Psionic_Sear.display_help: You hold your target with your psionic whip, preventing them from moving. While they helplessly tremble under your gaze, you are healed while they suffer psionic and fire damage over time. The affected target is also made highly resistant to healing.

Plasma_Blast.display_help: You fire a small blast of plasma at a single target, causing energy damage and reducing regeneration.

Shield_Generator.display_help: You create a bubble that amplifies the defenses of all nearby allies and yourself. The bubble also protects allies inside from immobilize and stun effects.

Plasmatic_Immobilizer.display_help: You fire an immobilizing blast in a cone in front of you that causes energy damage and prevents your affected targets from moving.

Deploy_Stimulant.display_help: You heal a single targeted ally while also removing any crowd control effects and granting resistance to further crowd control effects for a short time.
Deploy_Stimulant.display_short_help: Ranged, Heal (Ally), +RES (Stun, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Terrorize)

Sonic_Augmentation.display_help: You create a bubble that amplifies the damage and chance to hit of all nearby allies and yourself.

Plasma_Spray.display_help: You unleash a spray of plasma that affects multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Affected targets suffer energy damage and reduced regeneration.

Resuscitator.display_help: You revive an ally with a good amount of health and endurance.

Plasmatic_Stunner.display_help: You fire a blast of plasma at a single target, causing energy damage and stunning your target.

Chemical_Burn.display_help: This patch of incendiary chemicals causes fire damage to all foes caught within it, as well as reducing their attack speed.
Chemical_Burn.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning. Your attack speed has also been reduced.

Plasma_Blast.display_help: You fire a plasma blast at your target. This causes energy damage and lowers the target's regeneration.

Plasma_Ray.display_help: You fire a concentrated ray of plasma that pierces multiple targets. Affected targets suffer energy damage and reduced recovery.

Plasma_Spray.display_help: You fire a plasma spray in a wide cone in front of you. Affected targets within the spray suffer energy damage over time and reduced regeneration.

Welding_Ray.display_help: You fire your welding ray at a single target. The target suffers energy damage and reduced defenses.

Particle_Blast.display_help: You fire a blast from your shoulder mounted particle weapon. This causes energy damage to the target. The blast does not immediately dissipate all particles on contact with the target, allowing additional energy damage to occur over time after the initial blast.
Particle_Blast.display_target_help: You are suffering energy damage over time.

Nano_Repair.display_help: You heal a single targeted ally with nanites released from your shoulder cannon. These nanites continue to perform additional repairs over time, though with less strength than the initial action.

Particle_Spray.display_help: Android Menders are capable of firing a blast from their shoulder mounted particle weapon. Enemies struck by this attack will suffer energy damage and additional energy damage over time.
Particle_Spray.display_target_help: You are suffering damage over time from the Particle Blast.

Quick_Repair.display_help: You can fully repair a fallen Clockwork ally, giving it full health and endurance.

Antimatter_Beam.display_help: You fire a beam of antimatter in a wide cone in front of you. This causes energy damage to affected targets and reduces their defenses.
Antimatter_Beam.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Anti-Matter Beam.

Antimatter_Ray.display_help: You create a persistent field of antimatter particles that causes energy damage and reduced defenses on all foes which pass through its area.

Plasma_Punch.display_help: You charge up your plasma gauntlets to deliver a powerful punch to your target. This causes smashing and energy damage. It also has a chance to knock your target down.
Plasma_Punch.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Plasma_Vortex.display_help: You charge up your plasma gauntlets and whirl around, swinging your fists in a wide arc, hitting multiple targets. Affected targets suffer energy and smashing damage and may be briefly stunned.
Plasma_Vortex.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Plasma_Smasher.display_help: You charge up your plasma gauntlets to deliver an extremely strong blow with both of your fists. This attack deals smashing and energy damage. It also has a high chance to stun your target.
Plasma_Smasher.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Plasma_Blast.display_help: You charge up your plasma gauntlets, firing a small blast of plasma at a single target. The target suffers energy damage and is set ablaze, suffering additional fire damage over time. The target may also be knocked down by the attack.
Plasma_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Minor DoT(Fire), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Plasma_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Plasma_Spray.display_help: You charge up your plasma gauntlets, firing a stream of plasma that can strike multiple targets in front of you. Affected targets suffer energy damage and are set ablaze, suffering additional fire damage over time. Affected targets may also be knocked down by the attack.
Plasma_Spray.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Energy), Minor DoT (Fire), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Plasma_Spray.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Plasma_Burst.display_help: You charge up your plasma gauntlets, firing a large burst of plasma at a single target. The target suffers energy damage and is set ablaze, suffering additional fire damage over time. The target may also be knocked down by the attack.
Plasma_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Minor DoT (Fire), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Plasma_Burst.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Plasma_Grenade.display_help: You throw a plasma grenade at a single target. This grenade explodes into a field of plasma which burns any targets caught within the field.

Summon_Battle_Orb.display_help: You summon a Battle Orb to assist you. The Battle Orb that arrives may be one of three varieties.

IDF_Armor.display_help: Your IDF battle armor grants you improved resistance to all forms of damage.

Punch.display_help: You strike your target with a strong punch. This causes smashing damage and has the potential to knock the target back.
Punch.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Haymaker.display_help: You strike your target with a powerful haymaker. This causes smashing damage and may knock your target back.
Haymaker.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Uppercut.display_help: You perform a jaw breaking Crushing Uppercut on your target inflicting Extreme Smashing damage and knocking them into the air. Crushing Uppercut will leave the target disoriented for a short time. Crushing Uppercut is a Finisher and will set your Combo Level to 0. It will deal additional damage and have a longer disorient duration dependent upon the current Combo Level. At Combo Level 3, Crushing Uppercut will have its disorient effect upgraded to a Hold effect. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Uppercut.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG (Smashing), Knockup (Foe), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Nova_Fist.display_help: You slam the ground, unleashing a wave of energy that devastates the foes around you. This causes smashing and energy damage, as well as knocking affected foes back. Affected targets will be stunned by the force of this attack.
Nova_Fist.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG (Smashing/Energy), Knockback (Foe), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Hand_Clap.display_help: Using your massive strength, you clap your hands together with such power that you create a shockwave which knocks foes around you back. There is also a chance that affected targets are stunned.

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. Any targets around you affected by this attack suffer smashing damage and may be knocked down.
Foot_Stomp.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Hurl.display_help: You pull a mass of earth from the ground and throw it at a single target. The target suffers smashing damage and may be knocked back.
Hurl.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Chemical_Grenade.display_help: You throw a chemical grenade at a single target. This grenade explodes into an incendiary field that causes fire damage and reduces the attack speed of any targets caught within the field.

Jab.display_help: You strike your target with a quick jab. This causes smashing damage and has a small chance to stun the target.
Jab.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing), Chance for Stun (Foe)

Punch.display_help: You strike your target with a strong punch. This causes smashing damage and has the potential to knock the target back.
Punch.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Haymaker.display_help: You strike your target with a powerful haymaker. This causes smashing damage and may knock your target back.
Haymaker.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Hurl.display_help: You pull a mass of earth from the ground and throw it at a single target. The target suffers smashing damage and may be knocked back.
Hurl.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. Any targets around you affected by this attack suffer smashing damage and may be knocked down.
Foot_Stomp.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)

Dull_Pain.display_help: Using your superior metabolism, you can make yourself more resilient to pain, allowing you to suffer more damage before being defeated. When you activate this power you will increase your maximum Hit Points for a couple of minutes.
Dull_Pain.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

Metabolic_Superiority.display_help: Your superior metabolism increases your base regeneration rate. This is so powerful an effect that there is a small chance that it will occasionally heal you outright.

Integration.display_help: You can integrate your mind and body, making you resistant to Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilization effects. This also increases your regeneration rate, but the effect is suppressed if you are affected by controls like Hold, Sleep or Stun.
Integration.display_attacker_hit: You are now highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep and Knockback.

Tectonic_Assault.display_help: You thrust your weapon into the ground with tremendous force. This energy is released at a nearby foe, creating a miniature earthquake at their location.

Defensive_Sweep.display_help: You quickly strike your opponent from a defensive position, causing smashing damage. The force of the blow also has a chance to slow their response time. Additionally, your chance to hit and your defense against melee and smashing attacks is increased for a short time.
Defensive_Sweep.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), Moderate DMG (Smashing), +DEF (Self, Melee, Smashing), +ToHit (Self), Chance for -Rech (Foe)
Defensive_Sweep.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

Crushing_Blow.display_help: You swing your weapon at your target with tremendous force. The blow causes smashing damage and internal trauma, which causes lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in movement speed and ability to fly.
Crushing_Blow.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Smashing), Minor DoT (Lethal), -Speed (Foe, All), -Fly (Foe)
Crushing_Blow.display_target_help: You have suffered internal trauma and are taking lethal damage over time. Your movement speed and your ability to fly have been reduced.

Shockwave_Strike.display_help: You swing your weapon in a wide arc and create a shockwave that travels in the direction of your target. Opponents hit by the shockwave suffer smashing damage. Targets may also be knocked back and suffer a brief reduction in their regeneration and recovery.
Shockwave_Strike.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Knockback (Foe)
Shockwave_Strike.display_target_help: Your regeneration and recovery have been reduced.

Follow_Through.display_help: You channel your energy into an especially powerful swing. This swing does significant smashing damage and causes sufficient trauma to induce lethal damage due to internal bleeding.
Follow_Through.display_short_help: Melee (Targeted AoE), High DMG (Smashing), Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Knockup (Foe), -Fly(Foe)
Follow_Through.display_target_help: You have been knocked back and suffer exhaustion, reducing your regeneration and recovery.

Shatter_Armor.display_help: You batter your enemy with your weapon, causing significant smashing damage and temporarily debilitating their defenses and resistances.
Shatter_Armor.display_short_help: Melee (Targeted AoE), Superior DMG (Smashing), -DEF (Foe, All), -RES (Foe, All)
Shatter_Armor.display_target_help: Your defenses and resistances have been decreased.

Arc_of_Devastation.display_help: You swing your weapon in a powerful arc which deals smashing damage to all in the way. There is also a chance that the target may be knocked down and stunned. If stunned, the opponent will also suffer reductions in attack speed and recharge rate.
Arc_of_Devastation.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Knockdown (Foe), Stun (Foe), -Rech (Foe), -ToHit (Foe)
Arc_of_Devastation.display_target_help: You have been stunned and both your attack speed and chance to hit have been reduced.

Taunt.display_help: You taunt a targeted foe, potentially drawing the attention of that foe and all those around them. All targets will have their effective range reduced, while some will be able to focus on no other attacker but you.
Taunt.display_target_help: Your effective range has been reduced. You may also be taunted and only able to focus on Pendragon.

Fusion_Burn.display_help: This patch of plasma causes energy and fire damage to all foes caught within it.
Fusion_Burn.display_target_help: You are caught in a fusion burn field and are suffering fire and energy damage over time.

Barb_Swipe.display_help: You shred a single target with a spine emerging from your arm. The affected target suffers lethal damage and is poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Barb_Swipe.display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Barb_Swipe.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Lunge.display_help: You lunge forward, stabbing and poisoning a foe with the large spine on your arm. The affected target suffers lethal damage and is poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Lunge.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Lunge.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Spine_Burst.display_help: You fling dozens of spines in a sphere around yourself, hitting multiple nearby targets. Affected targets suffer lethal damage and are poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Spine_Burst.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Spine_Burst.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Impale.display_help: You throw a single large spine at a targeted foe. The affected target suffers lethal damage and is poisoned. The force of the spine's impact will also bring flying targets to the ground. The poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Impale.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), -Fly(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Impale.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Ripper.display_help: You unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all foes in a wide arc in front of you. Affected targets suffer lethal damage and are poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Ripper.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Ripper.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Throw_Spines.display_help: You throw dozens of spines in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the range. Affected targets suffer lethal damage and are poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Throw_Spines.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Throw_Spines.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Coruscating_Armor.display_help: You are encased in a field of coruscating energy that provides resistance to all forms of damage except psionic and toxic.
Coruscating_Armor.display_short_help: Auto (Self), +RES(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy)

Lightning_Field.display_help: You emit a continuous field of electricity with deals energy damage to and drains the endurance of any foes caught within the field of effect.
Lightning_Field.display_target_help: You are suffering energy damage and endurance loss.

Electric_Fence.display_help: You surrounds a target in an Electric Fence, immobilizing them and dealing energy damage over time. This attack also drains endurance from your target and may reduce their recovery rate.
Electric_Fence.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Energy), -End (Foe), Immobilize (Foe), Chance for -Rec(Foe)
Electric_Fence.display_target_help: You are immobilized and suffering energy damage over time. You are also experiencing endurance loss. Your recovery may also be reduced.

Tectonic_Assault.display_help: The earth is shaking. Foes caught in your field of effect suffer smashing damage over time and are unable to fly.
Tectonic_Assault.display_target_help: You are caught in a minor earthquake and suffer smashing damage over time. You are also unable to fly.

Field.display_help: The earth is shaking. Foes caught in your field of effect suffer smashing damage over time and are unable to fly.
Field.display_target_help: You are caught in a minor earthquake and suffer smashing damage over time. You are also unable to fly.
